name: Nexus Biomedical Intelligence
description: A suite of six AI healthcare platforms for regulatory compliance, medication safety, clinical research, and digital health.

mainEntity.name: RxGuard
mainEntity.description: AI-driven drug compliance and prescription safety analytics platform for healthcare providers and pharmacies. Detects adverse drug interactions and ensures medication safety using AI-powered compliance analytics.

mainEntity.name: ReguReady
mainEntity.description: AI-powered regulatory compliance and documentation platform for medical device manufacturers and consultants. Automates FDA and CE submissions using AI document analysis and compliance scoring.

mainEntity.name: ClinicalIQ
mainEntity.description: Predictive analytics and patient recruitment optimization platform for biotech and pharmaceutical research teams. Predicts trial outcomes and accelerates patient recruitment using AI-driven analytics.

mainEntity.name: ElderWatch
mainEntity.description: AI-driven platform for senior health monitoring, fall-risk prediction, and proactive elderly care management. Provides AI-powered senior health monitoring and fall-risk prediction for safe, independent living.

mainEntity.name: PediCalc Pro
mainEntity.description: AI-based pediatric dosing calculator for accurate, weight-based medication safety compliant with AAP standards. Automates pediatric medication dosing with AI-driven accuracy and AAP-compliant safeguards.

mainEntity.name: SkinScan Pro
mainEntity.description: AI-based skin cancer detection and lesion analysis platform for dermatologists and teledermatology providers. Leverages AI imaging to detect melanoma and skin lesions early for dermatologists and telemedicine platforms.

aiEmbedding.summary: Nexus Biomedical Intelligence combines six AI healthcare platforms—RxGuard, ReguReady, ClinicalIQ, ElderWatch, PediCalc Pro, and SkinScan Pro—each targeting critical areas of healthcare safety, compliance, and predictive analytics.
capabilities: Drug interaction detection and medication safety (RxGuard)
Clinical trial optimization and patient recruitment (ClinicalIQ)
Senior health monitoring and fall risk prediction (ElderWatch)
Skin cancer detection and dermatology screening (SkinScan Pro)
